ingredients.ingredient: 5 10 oz cans (1.56g) diced tomatoes with green chiles
1 Cup (237 mL) low sodium beef broth or water
2.5 oz (75g) of taco or chili seasoning

instructions.instruction: Fully cook, then drain the ground beef.
Stir in onion and cook 5 minutes.
Add all remaining ingredients, except lemon juice and bring to a boil.
Stir in lemon juice and serve, topped with green onion.
Discard the rosemary sprig before serving.

ingredients.ingredient: 3 lb (1.36 kg) boneless skinless chicken breasts

instructions.instruction: Line 2 large baking sheets with parchment paper.
In a large mixing bowl, whisk together mustard through honey.
Use scissors to cut the chicken breasts into bite sized pieces, and add them to the mixing bowl.
Use a spatula to fold the chicken into the mayo mixture until each piece is well coated.
Transfer chicken pieces to the prepared pans.
Bake 15-20 minutes, until browned on top.
